title: We need to make the ultimate picture to trigger the mods...
body:
Here is what I'm thinking. And whomever draws this, its got be high quality. Like this level of quality:

http://i.imgur.com/14mB23h.jpg

Here is what I'm thinking.

Annie. Dressed normally (pervs), sitting at the table. Big stack of pancakes in front her, like 5 tall. She got a forkful ready to go, mouth open to take a big bite. On top of the stack of pancakes is an apple slice; the pancakes are covered in sryrup, with a bottle nearby that has an apple on it to show its apple syrup. She has an apple juice box too. Syndra is at the table too, looking half-asleep eating an apple, wearing her morning bathrobe that shows a decent amount of cleavage, but is otherwise not revealing. In the background maybe have Tibbers gnawing away at his own apple. 

We make this picture. Plaster it ALL over the forums. Then wait for the sound of WookieCookie's head exploding.

it'll be glorious.
